quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the sub requirement of "adding melted cheese on top of the hot dog", consider if this addition affects the overall realism while maintaining a natural appearance and texture.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the melted cheese appear with a natural texture and color, without introducing any unnatural artifacts?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Considering the instruction to "add fried onions on top of the hot dog", evaluate if the added element fits naturally in terms of structure and visual credibility.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the fried onions positioned naturally on the hot dog, avoiding any distortion or breakage of geometric shapes?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Focusing on the requirement to "maintain structural coherence and visual plausibility", assess if the new elements harmonize with the existing scene.
quality_check_questions.question: Do the melted cheese and fried onions blend seamlessly with the hot dog buns and sausages, preserving structural consistency?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: Based on the requirement to "avoid unnatural textures and loss of details", examine the visual fidelity and detail preservation of the new elements.
quality_check_questions.question: Are the details of the melted cheese and fried onions preserved without losing clarity or introducing blurry textures?

quality_check_questions.thinking_process: According to the need to "add a barbecue tong as a dynamic element near the grill", verify the placement and integration of this new object for authenticity and visual credibility.
quality_check_questions.question: Does the barbecue tong look naturally placed near the grill, maintaining its structural integrity and proportion with the rest of the image elements?
